Disandingkan dengan Gibran, Purnomo masih Pikir Ulang
05 Nov 2019, 06:34 by Murni Prabowo


Disandingkan dengan Gibran, Purnomo masih Pikir Ulang

KBRN, Surakarta: Bakal Calon Walikota yang diusung PDI-P Achmad Purnomo mengaku bakal pikir-pikir apabila dicalonkan bersama putra sulung Presiden Joko Widodo, Gibran Rakabuming Raka. Dalam ajang kontestasi Pemilihan Kepala Daerah (Pilkada) 2020 mendatang pihaknya tidak akan berandai-andai.
Hal itu dikatakan Purnomo menanggapi komentar Gibran yang bersedia disandingkan dengannya, belum lama ini. Kepada Wartawan Purnomo mengatakan, sebagai petugas partai, dicalonkan oleh partai, dalam hal ini DPC. Jikalau partai meminta dirinya terus menjadi bakal calon, pihaknya akan lanjut. 
Persoalan dipasangkan dengan siapapun, posisinya sebagai wali kota atau wakil walikota tergantung partai,” ungkap Pria yang menjadi Wakil Walikota Surakarta itu kepada Wartawan di Balai Kota Surakarta, Senin (04/11/2019). 
Pihaknya akan memikirkan hal tersebut setelah mendapat perintah (rekomendasi) partai, bukan justru sebaliknya mikir dahulu sebelum mendapatkan rekomendasi. Purnomo mengaku enggan berandai-andai. Terlebih, dia masih diperbolehkan mencalonkan diri sebagai wali kota maupun wakil walikota. Ia juga mengaku tak punya ambisi pribadi, karena tujuannya mencalonkan diri adalah mengabdi untuk Kota Solo."Saya akan pikir-pikir, semua ada plus minusnya,” kata dia.Sementara itu terkait dirinya dilirik partai lain seperti Partai Amanat Nasional (PAN) dan Partai Keadilan Sejahtera (PKS) apabila PDIP tak jadi mencalonkannya, Purnomo mengaku tak akan mengambil kesempatan itu. “Enggaklah, saya tetap bersama PDIP,” ujarnya.
Sebelumnya, Dewan Pimpinan Cabang (DPC) PDIP Solo mencalonkan Purnomo sebagai wali kota dengan didampingi Teguh Prakosa sebagai wakil walikota ke Dewan Perwakilan Pusat (DPP). Belakangan, Gibran diketahui juga ingin mendaftar sebagai bakal calon wali kota. Meski pintu pendaftaran lewat DPC sudah ditutup, ia masih berkemungkinan mendaftar lewat Dewan Pimpinan Daerah (DPD) dan DPP.

Paired with Gibran, Purnomo is still Rethinking
05 Nov 2019, 06:34 by Murni Prabowo


Paired with Gibran, Purnomo is still Rethinking

KBRN, Surakarta: Willing Candidate Mayor who was carried by PDI-P Achmad Purnomo admitted he would think when nominated with the eldest son of President Joko Widodo, Gibran Rakabuming Raka. In the upcoming 2020 Regional Election (Pilkada) contestation, his party will not wish.
That was said by Purnomo in response to Gibran's comments who were willing to be juxtaposed with him recently. Purnomo told reporters that, as a party official, he was nominated by the party, in this case the DPC. If the party asks him to continue to be a candidate, he will continue.
The problem is paired with anyone, his position as mayor or deputy mayor depends on the party, "said the man who became the Deputy Mayor of Surakarta told reporters at the Surakarta City Hall on Monday (11/04/2019).
He will think about it after getting an order (recommendation) from the party, not the other way around thinking before getting a recommendation. Purnomo admitted that he was reluctant to suppose. Moreover, he was still allowed to run for mayor or deputy mayor. He also claimed that he had no personal ambition, because his aim was to serve Solo City. "I will think about it, all have pluses and minuses," he said. Prosperous Justice (PKS) if PDIP did not nominate him, Purnomo claimed that he would not take the opportunity. "No, I will stay with PDIP," he said.
Previously, the PDIP Solo Branch Board (DPC) nominated Purnomo as mayor accompanied by Teguh Prakosa as deputy mayor to the Central Representative Council (DPP). Later, Gibran was also known to want to register as a candidate for mayor. Even though the registration door through DPC has been closed, it is still possible to register through the Regional Leadership Council (DPD) and DPP.
